text: (Ej mu'minon) ʙipursed Parvardigoratonro ʙo zorivu iltico va pinhonu pusida, to ki du'ojaton az rijo dur ʙosad. Hamono Alloh dust nadorad az had guzarandagonro. (Buzurgtarin az had guzarandagon, onhoeand, ki dar vaqti du'o kardan ʙo Alloh sarik meorand. Ba monandi talaʙ kardan az murdaho va ƣajra)
